subject: Olympic Games (2016)
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: An I.O.C. evaluation committee will visit all four cities vying for the 2016 Summer Olympics. Chicago is its first stop; next up are Tokyo, Rio de Janeiro and Madrid.
snippet: An I.O.C. evaluation committee will visit all four cities vying for the 2016 Summer Olympics. Chicago is its first stop; next up are Tokyo, Rio de Janeiro and Madrid.
